import React from "react"; import ingredientDetailsStyles from "./ingredientDetails.module.css"; import IngredientType from "../../utils/types"; import { CloseIcon } from "@ya.praktikum/react-developer-burger-ui-components"; export default function IngredientDetails({ ingredient }) { return (

Детали ингредиента

{ingredient.name}

  • Калории,ккал {ingredient.calories}
  • Белки, г {ingredient.proteins}
  • Жиры, г {ingredient.fat}
  • Углеводы, г {ingredient.carbohydrates}
); } IngredientDetails.propTypes = { ingredient: IngredientType.isRequired, };
